mapper.select: select h.id as id, huser_name, hwrite_date, htype, hstart_date, hend_date, hcontent, half_day,approval, h.empno as empno, e.total_holiday as total_holiday FROM holiday h, employee_info e WHERE h.empno = e.empno AND h.empno = #{empno};
mapper.insert: insert into holiday(huser_name, htype, hstart_date, hend_date, hcontent, half_day, approval, empno) VALUES (#{huserName}, #{htype},#{hstartDate},#{hendDate},#{hcontent},#{halfDay},#{approval},#{empno});
